code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import ChoosePlaylist from"./choose_playlist";import{openModal as _openModal,closeModal as _closeModal}from"../../../actions/modal_actions";import{addSongToPlaylist as _addSongToPlaylist}from'../../../actions/playlist_actions';import{fetchUserPlaylists as _fetchUserPlaylists}from'../../../actions/playlist_actions';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{currentUser:state.session.user,playlists:state.entities.playlist};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{openModal:function openModal(modal){return dispatch(_openModal(modal));},closeModal:function closeModal(){return dispatch(_closeModal());},addSongToPlaylist:function addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId){return dispatch(_addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId));},fetchUserPlaylists:function fetchUserPlaylists(userId){return dispatch(_fetchUserPlaylists(userId));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ChoosePlaylist);
